snippet: A suspect in two assaults was charged on Thursday with the murder of Amy E. Lord, a 24-year-old South Boston woman found dead last week.
abstract: Edwin J Alemany, suspect in two assaults, is charged with murder of Amy E Lord, South Boston woman found dead after being abducted in July.
lead_paragraph: A suspect in two assaults was charged on Thursday with the murder of Amy E. Lord, a 24-year-old South Boston woman found dead last week.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Charge Set in Boston Woman’s Death
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Charge Set In Boston Woman’s Death
